title.narrative: Reducing irregular migration in northern Ethiopia

description.narrative: The present project contributes to reduce irregular migration from northern Ethiopia by creating greater economic and employment opp ortunities. The main objective of this project is to support the Government of the FDR of Ethiopia (GoE) in the creation of decent and productive work for young women and men through the development of high potential sectors particularly in the area of agro-industries and related. Furthermore, this project will be linked to the on-going project entitled: #Establishing industrial processing and marketing of cactus fruits (Beles-based) food products for increased income in rural communities in Northern Ethiopia#, that is located in one of the main routes of passage of migrants and refugees particularly, from Eritrea living in the camps around the towns of Adigrat, Wukro and Shire. The main objective of this Beles project is to improve the livelihood of targeted rural communities in Tigray, with special emphasis on women.
